Description:
Self-sufficient multi-stage CI/CD pipeline for containerized applications with Blue/Green deployments.
Includes complete ECS infrastructure: VPC, ALB, ECS Cluster, Services, and ECR Repository.

Features:
- 5-stage pipeline (Source → Build → Test → Deploy-Staging → Deploy-Production)
- Blue/Green deployments with zero downtime
- Customer-managed KMS encryption
- Comprehensive monitoring and notifications
- Complete ECS infrastructure included

Source.BuildSpec:
version: 0.2
phases:
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build started on `date`
      - echo Logging in to Amazon ECR...
      - aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com
      - echo ECR Repository URI is $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Building the Docker image...
      - docker build -t $IMAGE_REPO_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG .
      - docker tag $IMAGE_REPO_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$IMAGE_TAG
      - docker tag $IMAGE_REPO_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$CODEBUILD_BUILD_NUMBER
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Pushing the Docker images...
      - docker push $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$IMAGE_TAG
      - docker push $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$CODEBUILD_BUILD_NUMBER
      - echo Writing image definitions file...
      - printf '[{"name":"app","imageUri":"%s"}]' $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$IMAGE_TAG > imagedefinitions.json
      - echo Writing task definition template...
      - printf '{"family":"cicd-app-task-dev","networkMode":"awsvpc","requiresCompatibilities":["FARGATE"],"cpu":"256","memory":"512","executionRoleArn":"arn:aws:iam::%s:role/ecs-task-execution-role-dev","containerDefinitions":[{"name":"app","image":"%s","portMappings":[{"containerPort":%s,"protocol":"tcp"}],"essential":true,"logConfiguration":{"logDriver":"awslogs","options":{"awslogs-group":"/ecs/cicd-app-dev","awslogs-region":"%s","awslogs-stream-prefix":"ecs"}}}]}' $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI:$IMAGE_TAG $CONTAINER_PORT $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION > taskdef.json
      - echo Writing appspec file...
      - printf 'version: 0.0\nResources:\n  - TargetService:\n      Type: AWS::ECS::Service\n      Properties:\n        TaskDefinition: <TASK_DEFINITION>\n        LoadBalancerInfo:\n          ContainerName: "app"\n          ContainerPort: %s' $CONTAINER_PORT > appspec.yaml
artifacts:
  files:
    - imagedefinitions.json
    - taskdef.json
    - appspec.yaml

version: 0.2
phases:
  install:
    runtime-versions:
      nodejs: 18
      python: 3.9
    commands:
      - echo Installing test dependencies...
      - yum update -y
      - yum install -y docker
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Test phase starting on `date`
      - echo Testing Docker image from $ECR_REPOSITORY_URI
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Running security tests...
      - echo Scanning Docker image for vulnerabilities
      - echo Running unit tests...
      - echo Running integration tests...
      - echo Running performance tests...
      - echo All tests passed successfully
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Tests completed on `date`
      - echo Preparing artifacts for deployment...
artifacts:
  files:
    - imagedefinitions.json
    - taskdef.json
    - appspec.yaml
  name: TestArtifacts
